content: i recently decided to revisit my basic beanie/hat pattern after designing my candy corn and scarecrow hats using an i 5 5mm crochet hook i found that i really liked the size and closeness of the stitches i m very excited to share my findings and new beanie pattern with you all i was even able to add a preemie size using the same hook and number of starting stitches free pattern https //lovableloops com/patterns/free-basic-beanie-crochet-pattern/
